category.name: Integration.CATIA
category.category_description: No description available for this category.

preference.name: CATIA_search_mmlassy_links_on_save
preference.preference_description: Set to true to search MMLAssy Links between two parts in a same assembly (ref-inst relationships) and to expose links in Teamcenter during the Save process. Set to false, to prevent searching for ref-inst relationships.
